definitions.title: n. pr. loc. 1.
definitions.body: in lowland of Judah Jos 12:17 (LXX Tafout, A Qaffou, LXXL Qapfou), Jos 15:34 (LXX Iloulwq, LXXL Qaffoua).

on border between Ephraim and Manasseh Jos 16:8 (LXX Tafou, LXXL Qapfoue), Jos 17:8, Jos 17:8 (LXX Qafeq, A Qafqwq, LXXL Qafwq), = ´[[עֵין ת]] v:Jos 17:7 (LXX Qafqwq, LXXL Nafqwq); so read also perh. 2Ki 15:16 (for MT [[תִּפְסַח]]; LXXL Th Kmp:Kau Benz; LXX Qersa, A Qaira, but LXXL th\n Tafwe). On locality v. Buhl:Geogr. 178.—Vid. also [[בֵּית תַּפּוּחַ]].
